Room.Name: Garnet Room
Room.ShortDescription: The rooms walls are dark red slabs of mirror-like polished garnet.
Room.LongDescription: Reflections in reflections in reflections. There are ten thousand images in blood red garnet all about you. An elderly woman is seated between two elven cats, and they reflect into infinity. She teases one of the cats with a tiny key on a dangling silver chain. She wears a red robe.
